|brand = Hardkernel |model = ODROID |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -N2 |revision = (4GB) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/10/2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ODROID-N2 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Amlogic;S922X; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_cores2 = 2 |cpu1_total_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A73 |cpu1_type2 = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- 1.8-1.9 GHz --> |cpu1spd2 = 1.9 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25U6435FM2I-10G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = ISSI;IS25LQ512B; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4A8G165WC-BCTD; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1E:06
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2015.01;; |stockos = Linux;4.9.162-22;Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (OTG), USB 3.0 (Type A), Micro SD Card slot, HDMI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 5 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 1.8V TTL,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module connector, HDMI 2.0, Audio/CVBS, IR receiver, RTC w/ battery backup, GPIO, fan headers, SPI, I2C, ADC header, heatsink, SPDIF out, |addchip = CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1;,,, USB 3.1 Gen 1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3523;;1;,,, 3-Vrms Audio Driver with Adjustable Gain;DIOO Micro;DIO2133;;1;,,, 3.3V 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ 100mA LDO;MPS;NB680;;1;,,, 5V, 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ 100mA LDO;MPS;NB679;;1;,,, 18V, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy Corp;SY8120B;;2;,,, 500mA Bypass Capacitor CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9013;;2;,,, 300mA LDO Adjustable Regulator w/ Enable;Richtek;RT9179;;1;,,, 26V, 6A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8756;;2;,,, 2-Channel ESD Protection for USB 3.0;TI;TPD2EUSB30;;8;,,, USB Power Distribution Switch;First Silicon;FC9516A;;1;,,, 300mA CMOS Linear Regulator;First Silicon;FC8731;;2;,,, Low Power Voltage Detector;Torex;XC61FN2712MR;;1;,,, 0.2A Single Channel Load Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2331;;1;,,, 1.7A Programmable Current-Limited Power Distribution Switch;MPS;MP62551;;4; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = odroid |defaultpass = odroid |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Android PIE, Armbian, Arch Linux (Arm), DietPi, Volumio,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2019 |estprice = 79 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07S655F4X |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Korea
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== eMMC module connector with modules of 8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB and 128GB available.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] [https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/02/01/amlogic-s922x-benchmarks/ S922X] (ARMv8-A 64-bit) :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A73) @1.8GHz :+ Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.9GHz *GPU: ''Mali-G52 MP4'' @800MHz (AFBC, DX12, :OpenGL ES3.2, OpenVG1.1, OpenCL 2.0) *Storage: 8MB (SPI NOR), (eMMC 4.5) Flash, :TF card (max.256GB)/MMC Card slot *RAM: 4GB (DDR4) @1320MHz *USB: 4x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) ports *Network: 1x 1GbE port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin connector *Power Source: 12V/2A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid-n2/odroid-n2 ''ODROID-N2'' on '''ODROID Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/02/13/odroid-n2-amlogic-s922x-sbc/ ''ODROID-N2 Amlogic S922X SBC Coming in April for $63 and Up'' on '''CnxSoft''']
==See also== :;[[ODROID]] • [[Amlogic]] • [https://www.hardkernel.com/product-category/odroid-board/amlogic/ Board] *[[ODROID-C0]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A5) CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A5) CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1+]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A5) CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C2]] - ''Amlogic'' S905 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @2.0GHz *[[ODROID-C4]] - ''Amlogic'' S905X3 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A55) CPU @2.0GHz *[[ODROID-HC4]] - ''Amlogic'' S905X3 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A55) CPU @2.0GHz *[[ODROID-GO Ultra]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A73) @2.2GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM (Cortex-A53) @2.0GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A73) @1.8GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.9GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2+]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A73) @2.4GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM (Cortex-A53) @2.0GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2L]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A73) @2.2GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM (Cortex-A53) @2.0GHz [https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid-n2l/hardware CPU] <!-- *[[ODROID-U2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-U3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-X]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.4GHz *[[ODROID-X2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-XU]] - "Samsung" Exynos 5410 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @1.6GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.2GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3 Lite]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @1.8GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.3GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU4]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.4GHz CPU -->
